edu.cmu.sphinx.api

Class SpeechResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.api.SpeechResult

  • public final class SpeechResult
extends Object
    High-level wrapper for Result instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SpeechResult(Result result)
      Constructs recognition result based on Result object.

    • Method Detail

      • getWords

        public List<WordResult> getWords()
        Returns List of words of the recognition result. Within the list words are ordered by time frame.
        Returns:
        words that form the result
